Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which we believe could significantly enhance your business operations and drive substantial growth. This innovative solution is tailored to meet your unique needs and expectations, offering unparalleled value and efficiency. Considering its comprehensive capabilities and market positioning, we are offering this exceptional product to you at an exclusive price of $950000. We are confident that this investment will pay off in numerous ways, contributing to your company's success and profitability. Should you choose to accept this offer, we stand ready to provide unparalleled support throughout the implementation process. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
